    static void
    checkPlaneLandingLaneStatus(String airline, String airport, int landingLaneCode, LocalDateTime arrivalOfPlane, String planeCode)
    This is the most convoluted function: First it checks if the plane can land on the landing lanes and then checks wether its already there or not If its not and the plane has no asigned landing lane it just adds the plane to the landing lane If it already has the same landing lane nothing but a System.out happens If the plane already has a diferent landing lane the funct ask the user wether to keep the original landing lane in wich case nothing happens or wether to change it to the new landing lane removing the plane from the lane traffic of said landing lane and updating the plane asigned landing lane information

    • getLandingLaneCodeFromUser

      public static int getLandingLaneCodeFromUser(String airline, String airport, LocalDateTime arrivalOfPlane, LocalDateTime departureOfPlane, String planeCode)
      Gets the landing lane code from the user, showing the available landing lanes by checkign the compatibility with the new plane that we wanna add to a landing lane.
      Parameters:
      airline - The ariline the landing lane and the plane belong to
      airport - The airport the landing lane belongs to
      arrivalOfPlane - The localdatetime we wanna be checking for compatibility with the landing lane
      Returns:
      The code of the landing lane we are gonna be adding the new plane to

    • checkPlaneLandingLaneStatus

      public static void checkPlaneLandingLaneStatus(String airline, String airport, int landingLaneCode, LocalDateTime arrivalOfPlane, String planeCode)
      This is the most convoluted function: First it checks if the plane can land on the landing lanes and then checks wether its already there or not If its not and the plane has no asigned landing lane it just adds the plane to the landing lane If it already has the same landing lane nothing but a System.out happens If the plane already has a diferent landing lane the funct ask the user wether to keep the original landing lane in wich case nothing happens or wether to change it to the new landing lane removing the plane from the lane traffic of said landing lane and updating the plane asigned landing lane information
      Parameters:
      airline - The airline the plane and the landing lane belong to
      airport - The airport where the landing lane is located
      landingLaneCode - The code of the landing lane we want to asing to the new plane
      arrivalOfPlane - Time of arrival of plane
      planeCode - Code of the plane we want to asign to the landing lane

    • checkCompatibilityWithLane

      public static boolean checkCompatibilityWithLane(String airline, String airport, int i, LocalDateTime arrivalOfPlane)
      Checks if the new plane is compatible with the landing lane we wanna add it to
      Parameters:
      airline - The airline the plane and the landing lane belong to
      airport - The airport the landing lane belongs to
      i - The position of the landing lane in the array of landing lanes
      newPlane - The plane we wanna add to the landing lane
      Returns:
      True if the plane is compatible with the landing lane, false if it is not
